result.purpose: This file defines a Redis client configuration and provides functions to create and manage a Redis client with optional TLS support and Prometheus metrics.
side_effects: Panic if client creation fails in MakeRedisClient
Register Prometheus collector which may cause an error if already registered
risks: Potential exposure of sensitive information if Password is logged or mishandled
Insecure TLS configuration if InsecureSkipVerify is set to true
